site_name: East Wick Phase 7, Development Parcels 5.2 And 5.3, Planning Delivery Zone 5, , Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park, London,
description: Application for the approval of reserved matters for the development of 164 residential units (Use Class C3), 170sqm employment floorspace (offices, research and development and industrial processes (Use Class E)) and 632sqm of retail floorspace (shops, financial and professional services, cafes or restaurants (Use Class E) and/or drinking establishments and hot food takeaways (Sui Generis)), with associated car parking, hard and soft landscaping, public realm, streetscape and associated works pursuant to conditions LCS0.27 and LCS0.28 of outline planning permission 11/90621/OUTODA as varied by 18/00471/VAR being details of layout, scale, appearance, means of access and landscape
